text: The Arizonian is a 1935 American western movie directed by Charles Vidor and starring Richard Dix, Margot Grahame, Preston Foster, Francis Ford, Louis Calhern, Hattie McDaniels. It was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1935 movies Category:1930s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Charles Vidor
title: The Arizonian
